item.title: Chhalaang: A PT Teacher’s Take on Coaching, Motivation, and Power of Play
item.author: academyibsports@gmail.com (Ishwar Bhati)
item.description: A reflection on the inspiring journey of Chhalaang, that mirrors the highs and lows of real sports coaching. From building belief to challenging outdated mindsets about sports vs studies, this is a powerful reminder of what it means to be a coach, and why play is serious business.
